title: Outnumbered: Six Sisters and Me
description: Jasper, he looks like any other average teenage boy, but looks can often be deceiving. Jasper holds a deep secret; only he and two of his sisters know about his secret. He must keep this secret from his school at all costs. Jasper is outnumbered; he lives with his six teenage sisters and his mother. The story includes adventure, family situations, secrets and a little romance. Then there are those nuns to tend with and where do they fit into all this?
author: Peter Lewis Atkinson
